name: Bugnic
description:
BUGNIC

https://github.com/patrickbard/bugnic

You and your miss go out to a picnic, but lots of bugs got in your way.

As a fancy frog that you are, you do not want to get your hands dirty so you use a flyswatter.

During game play, use ESC/SPACE to pause.

Use your mouse to control the flyswatter and left click to strike a hit.

Take notice that there is a slight delay between clicking and actually hitting your targets... and you can use that in your advantage.

Try to kill as many bugs as you can before too many of them got out of your view.
